item.title: ERROR With my NPC Talking
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Well, do you want it to just say it out loud?

If so, just fill in whatever you need to fill inâ€¦

if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "[TEXT]"; } }
